import React from 'react' import TextoInfo from './TextoInfo'; class Form extends React.Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { estado: '', nome: '', idade: 0, email: '', comentario:'', aceito: false, file: '', textoInfo: '', } this.handleState = this.handleState.bind(this); } handleState({ target }) { const value = (target.type === 'checkbox') ? target.checked : target.value; const { name } = target; this.setState({ [name]: value }) } render() { return(
